special_text:
[i]Converge[/i] – Glitch enters the battlefield with an additional loyalty counter on her for each color of mana spent to cast her.
[+1]: Create two 1/1 blue Elemental creature tokens with flying.
[-3]: Draw two cards. When you do, Glitch deals damage to any target equal to the number of cards in your hand.
[-10]: Destroy all lands, enchantments, and artifacts you don't control.
